topic.title: Oxygen AI Positron Vertex AI Connector Plugin for Web Author

body.p: The Oxygen AI Positron Vertex AI Connector plugin provides a connector for the Oxygen AI Positron for Web Author. The connector, named Vertex AI Service, enables integration with Google Cloud's Vertex AI platform. The Oxygen AI Positron Vertex AI Connector is compatible with Oxygen XML Web Author version 27.1.0 or newer.

section.title: Installation
section.p: You can download the plugin from here: Oxygen AI Positron Vertex AI Connector Download.
You can then install the plugin in Web Author to make the Vertex AI Service connector available in the Oxygen AI Positron for Web Author plugin.

section.title: How to Configure the Vertex AI Service Connector
section.p:
When the Vertex AI Service is selected from the AI Service administration page, the following options are available to configure the connector:
Project ID The ID of your Google Cloud project.
Location The location of your Google Cloud project (e.g. us-central1).
Model The AI model to use (e.g. google/gemini-2.5-flash).
Credential The connector supports authentication using a Service Account Key file. Provide the content of the Google credential JSON file in this field to enable authentication. If this field is left empty, the application will use Google Cloudâ€™s Application Default Credentials (documentation), searching for credentials in the following locations:
GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS environment variable.
The attached service account.
